code: @Override @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     createApplicationContext(). }

@Override protected AbstractXmlApplicationContext createApplicationContext() {     AbstractXmlApplicationContext answer.     try {         answer = new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext("org/apache/camel/spring/config/SpringRouteNoFromTest.xml").         fail("Should have thrown exception").     } catch (RuntimeCamelException e) {         IllegalArgumentException iae = (IllegalArgumentException) e.getCause().         assertEquals("Route myRoute has no inputs: Route(myRoute)[[] -> [To[mock:result]]]", iae.getMessage()).         return null.     }     return answer. }
